Package com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint>
    A base interface for classes to extend in order to build a custom Sender, for a custom ProductionEndPoint.
    DatumProducer<TDomainClass>
    The base interface for a DatumConsumer.
    NamedSender<T>
    A Sender that has an alias.
    Sender<TInput>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,TBuilder extends AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,?>>  
    AletheiaBuilder.InternalBreadcrumbProducerMetricFactoryProvider
    A special case AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider used only when reporting metrics from a breadcrumb dedicated DatumProducer, that is, a DatumProducer whose only purpose in life is to produce breadcrumbs (breadcrumb is itself, a special kind of datum).
    AuditingDatumProducer<TDomainClass>
    A Breadcrumb generating, DatumEnvelope transportation based DatumProducer implementation.
    CompositeDatumProducer<TDomainClass>
    Combines multiple DatumProducer by creating a new one that upon a request to deliver a datum, delivers it using all the internal DatumProducers is a sequential order (the order they were passed in).
    DatumEnvelopePeelingStringSender
    A special case of a NamedSender&lt;DatumEnvelope&gt;, that extracts the datum part of the incoming DatumEnvelope, and decodes it using UTF-8 encoding.
    DatumProducerBuilder<TDomainClass>
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumProducer.
    DatumProducerConfig
    Configuration details for DatumProducers.
    InMemoryAccumulatingSender
    An Sender that stores incoming items in-memory, allowing one to query them later.
    InMemoryDatumEnvelopeSenderFactory
    Builds DatumEnvelopeSenders capable of sending data to an InMemoryProductionEndPoint.
    InMemoryProductionEndPoint
    This ProductionEndPoint type works in collaboration with the InMemoryAccumulatingSender, jointly, they allow one to store incoming items in-memory, and query them later on.
    ProductionEndPoint
    Represents a destination a DatumProducer can produce data to.
    RawDatumEnvelopeBinarySender
    A Sender implementation that sends DatumEnvelope without manipulating them in any way.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InMemoryProductionEndPoint.EndPointType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SilentSenderException
    Created by slevin on 7/9/14.
